textAfterTable: How To Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Neck: Measure around the base of your neck. Sleeve: Have someone measure from the center of the back or your neck down the arm, with arm slightly bent, to the wrist bone. Waist: Bend to the side and measure around the place where your waist bends, keeping the tape a bit loose.
